title: Conrad Martens
creator_credit: Clytie Jessop and National Trust of Australia
brief_description: Concerns the life and work of early Colonial artist Conrad Martens whose paintings and sketches are a valuable historical record of Australia. Deals with Marten’s work in England, his voyage on “The Beagle” and his friendship with Charles Darwin, and his output in Sydney.
